Articles.Content:
I've been having problems with the Akita Rover wheels, they keep rotating but they never actually move the rover anywhere.

I've tried some other wheels on the same construction and they work fine.

When I turn left/right the wheels just move the rover up or down, and I haven't been able to find an explanation for it

13 hours ago, kaehzar said:

I've been having problems with the Akita Rover wheels, they keep rotating but they never actually move the rover anywhere.

I've tried some other wheels on the same construction and they work fine.

When I turn left/right the wheels just move the rover up or down, and I haven't been able to find an explanation for it

Hi are you attaching the wheels in the correct orientation?  KSP wheels are not round and only have one position in which they work. The problem you have is very common and can usually be resolved by rotating the wheels when you attach them to the rover in the SPH,
